tweet.text: As a private citizen, Shultz facilitated the organization of the first G-6 summit, which took place in Rambouillet, France in November 1975. Read Shultz’s report to U.S. President Ford on his planning talks with European leaders related to the G-6 summit: https://t.co/jv4cnTpI77 https://t.co/tA2N6Rhzts
